thread.title: Omarosa Manigault harassed by anti-Trump shoppers
thread.title_full: Omarosa Manigault harassed by anti-Trump shoppers | Daily Mail Online

author: Emily Crane For Dailymail.com
title: Omarosa Manigault harassed by anti-Trump shoppers
text:
Omarosa Manigault was harassed and heckled by two anti-Trump 'fat ladies' while she was out shopping with her bridesmaids.
Manigault, one of Trump's White House communications directors, was picking out dresses at Nordstrom in Virginia on Saturday when the two women approached her, the Washington Post reports.
A witness said the former Apprentice star told security that 'these fat ladies won't stop following me' when she was in the cosmetics section of the store at Tysons Corner Center.
Scroll down for video
Omarosa Manigault (pictured last month) was heckled by two women who called her 'Trump's wh***' as she was shopping with her five bridesmaids in Nordstrom in Virginia on Saturday
The women allegedly shouted that Omarosa was 'Trump's wh***' as they followed her around in front of a dozen other shoppers.
Security eventually helped escort Omarosa to her car before asking the two women to leave the store.
Nordstrom confirmed an incident happened at the store.
Omarosa injured her foot at last month's inauguration and has been making her way around with a cane and orthopedic boot.
The 43-year-old got engaged to Pastor John Allen Newman at his Calvary Church in Jacksonville, Florida last year.
Omarosa is now employed as an assistant to the president and director of communications for the Office of Public Liaison
The 43-year-old got engaged to Pastor John Allen Newman (pictured) at his Calvary Church in Jacksonville, Florida last year
She is reportedly set to appear in an episode of TLC's 'Say Yes to the Dress' in the coming months.
Omarosa, who appeared on the first season of the Apprentice, worked on Trump's campaign as his director of African-American outreach. She was once dubbed America's most hated reality star.
She is now employed as an assistant to the president and director of communications for the Office of Public Liaison.
Nordstrom is the department store that announced last week is was dumping Ivanka Trump's clothing brand.
Omarosa injured her foot at last month's inauguration and has been making her way around with a cane and orthopedic boot
Omarosa (pictured in 2013) appeared on the first season of Trump's reality TV show The Apprentice
